rules_text:
Choose two –
• Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
• Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.
• Attempt a ritual. [i](Start a ritual or move to the next step.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]The Entities have always had rituals, but Smirke created blueprints for their followers.[/i]
